HotelElement.Name: Doubletree by Hilton Arlington DFW South

Description.Text: Facilities Guests can enjoy a pleasant stay in one of the 200 rooms. Services and facilities at the hotel include a restaurant, a dining area, a bar, a conference room, a business centre and a theatre hall. Wireless internet access is available to travellers in the public areas. Those arriving in their own vehicles can leave them in the car park of the hotel. Rooms The accommodation features rooms with air conditioning and a bathroom. Additional features include a fridge and a tea/coffee station. Little extras, including internet access, a telephone and WiFi, contribute to a great stay. A hairdryer is provided in the bathrooms. The establishment offers non-smoking rooms. Sports/Entertainment A refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool is an enjoyable way to cool down on hot days. Active guests can choose from a range of leisure activities, including a gym and bowling.
